title: Mayuri Kundanalu: Ruby Peacock Jhumka Earrings
materials: meticulously set with round cut diamonds and a central ruby. The jhumka tassels feature ruby beads with white pearl accents.
features: These exquisite earrings feature a graceful peacock (Mayuri) design, symbolizing beauty and royalty. The peacock is adorned with pavé-set diamonds, highlighting its intricate details. Below the peacock, a round diamond adds a touch of brilliance. The jhumka base is intricately designed with diamonds set in a dome shape, leading to cascading ruby bead tassels finished with delicate pearls. The fine craftsmanship reflects the rich jewelry tradition of Hyderabad.
occasions: traditional ceremonies (like Seemantham or half-saree function)
and elegant social gatherings. These earrings add a touch of regal charm to any ensemble.
description: These Mayuri Kundanalu are a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The combination of diamonds, rubies, and pearls, set in high-quality gold with Hyderabadi polish, ensures lasting beauty and value. The peacock motif adds a touch of cultural significance and auspiciousness, making it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. They are not just earrings; they are a statement piece that embodies tradition and sophistication.
